message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1200000. It's a great deal for you, as you know it's worth $800000 to you. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
I'm not sure if $1200000 is a good deal for me, I was thinking more along the lines of $900000

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While $900000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to compromise. I'll offer you the product for $1000000. This is a fair price that still allows me to make a reasonable profit.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1000000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $850000
